name: Morris.exe
description:
GAME'S STORY Legend has it that tiny Morris has been surfing between computers at ease for years, hacking everything in his path. But now his mission has been compromised with the arrival of antivirus. Help him complete his destiny of reach every computer of the world. Now that Morris life has become difficult,  you'll have to help him duplicate himself to infect as many devices as possible. DESCRIPTION Morris.exe is an arcade, puzzle 'Ice Tile' game were you will control our main character: Morris the worm. HOW TO PLAY        •    Use Q & A to move between options in the menu.         •    Use Space to select an option.        •    Use Escape in order to exit. CONTROLS Morris will move in four directions only.                                                Keyboard:                        •    O: Move left                                                                                                                                                    •    P:  Move right                                                                                                                                                 •    Q: Move up                                                                                                                                                      •    A: Move down        Joystick: You can also control our main character movements with the joystick. OBJECTIVE Solve the puzzle and get to the exit in the least amount of time and with as many chips as possible.

                                     

                                          Exit                                               Chip

ENEMIES Be aware of your surroundings, or they will end up hurting you.                                                     Enemy 1                                                                                              Enemy 2                                                                 Enemy 3                                                Enemy 4                                                                                                                                                                  AUTHORS AND LICENSE Developed by MedusaProjects:

GESTURE To reference the first winner of #CPCRetroDev 'Larcena's Legacy' we have an enemy that will shoot you LETTERS.                     Moreover, we also wanted to make a puzzle inspired by the in-game scene from the game. INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS For AMSTRAD CPC:        ➥ Insert the cassette        ➥ Type "RUN" and press ENTER        ➥ Press PLAY and then ANY KEY To run the game on EMULATOR:        ➥ We recomend the use of RetroVirtualMachine by loading the file with the .cst extension into the emulator, then type "RUN" and press ENTER. 
SOFTWARE USED
  • Visual Studio Code | Code editor
  • Tiled | Level editor
  • PaintTool SAI | Painting software
  • Arkos tracker 1.0 | Music & sound effects
  • CPCTelera | Game development framework
